title: Interpretation of a dream about entering prison and its consequences

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about entering prison in a dream In every country on earth, a place known as a prison has been established where criminals and other people who violate local laws and customs are kept, as there are many stories about prisoners and the prison system as a whole, it is also possible for people who suffer from injustice in their lives to dream of prison in one's sleep as well, some commentators see that seeing prison in a dream is a sign of good for the monarch. Interpretation of a dream about entering prison in a dream It is one of the visions that many people share in seeing entering prison, as many people believe that he is imprisoned in his dream and this belief is supported by a number of signs and symbols that do not correspond to reality and its interpretation. The dream includes the following: The dream of staying in prison indicates that the dreamer will live long and in good condition. Going to prison also represents the dreamer's return from exile. The dreamer's decision to restrict himself there is a message and a symbol that he will avoid diseases and epidemics and defend himself against them. When a person comes out of prison, he is freed from introversion, sadness and loneliness. Whoever dreams of his imprisonment, but the prison ceiling is missing, or that a ray of light enters from the prison window, this indicates optimism and hope. It is also one of the praiseworthy visions because it is salvation from the soul and relief from distress, distress and anguish. The dreamer's liberation, happiness, the disappearance of his fears and the solution of his problems is the opening of the prison doors. Moving from a small space to a larger space represents the light that will replace the pain, fatigue and misery that consumed the dreamer's existence one day. Leaving a prison that the dreamer does not know is a sign of freedom, happiness and comfort that he will soon experience in his life. If he sees himself building a prison, the dreamer meets a person with knowledge, morals and religion, who benefits from him and benefits the nation and the servants. The presence of another sultan or king imprisoned in a dream is a sign of bad luck The dreamer and his bad luck on his way. And whoever sees an unknown prison, this is a deviation and a person must avoid lusts. Prison in a dream can represent the dreamer's burial and his loneliness and perhaps a conspiracy. It can also refer to hypocrisy, hypocrisy and babysitting with rapists. Interpretation of dreams about going to prison without reason Entering prison in a dream is an unfavorable vision in most cases. Interpretation for a single woman includes: If a young woman dreams that she is imprisoned, this is a sign that God is punishing her for a sin she committed. Or he will soon be held accountable for the criminal behavior or sin he committed. Seeing someone else in prison is evidence that that person has been punished for his shameful behavior against a person or against the state. If the dreamer sees the prison doors open in front of him, this is strong evidence and how you interpret it is impressive. This is because it means liberation, achieving goals, stopping punishment and resolving cases. title: Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream: A child is one of the blessings that God bestows on His servants. He said in his favorite book that money and children are the adornment of the world, so follow us... Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream Interpretation scholars say that seeing a male infant in a dream indicates exposure to many problems and fears. If An unmarried girl saw a male child in her dream, this means that she will go through many problems and accumulations in her life. If the dreamer sees a small child smiling at him in a dream, this symbolizes overcoming difficulties and enjoying multiple successes. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a male child in a dream indicates To misfortunes, family problems and disagreements. If the fortuneteller sees a happy child in a dream, he will give him good news about the positive changes that will happen to him soon and the improvement of his circumstances. If a pregnant woman sees a male child in a dream, this means that she will suffer from many worries and problems in her life. Barren, If she sees a small child in a dream, it promises her that she will give birth to children after a long period of waiting. Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream by Ibn Sirin The great scholar Ibn Sirin says that seeing a male child in a dream means that she will soon give birth to a beautiful child and will be happy with him. In the event that the dreamer sees a tall child Hair in a dream, it symbolizes exposure to marital infidelity, which leads to separation from her. An unmarried girl, if she sees a beautiful child in a dream, indicates a close marriage with a good person and she will be happy with him. The dreamer who sees a child crawling towards her in a dream indicates good Luck and goodness coming to her. If she sees a male child urinating on her in a dream, this means that she will suffer from problems and the accumulation of worries. If the student sees a small child in a dream, smiling at him, it heralds good events and positive changes that will happen to him. If the dreamer sees a male child in a dream This means that he has a friend near him with whom he has enmity and hatred. If the dreamer sees buying a male child in a dream, he will act foolishly in many matters, which will bring him harm. Interpretation of seeing a male child in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees a handsome male child In a dream, it means that good and abundant livelihood will come to her soon. Also, for a dreamer to see a male child in a dream symbolizes a close marriage with a good person soon. And in case the dreamer sees a smiling child in a dream, this means good luck and great happiness that she will be happy with. Seeing Carrying an infant in an unmarried woman’s dreamIf an unmarried girl dreams that an infant is carrying her, this means a close relationship with a suitable person. If the dreamer sees a child in a dream, this means that he will enter into a good love relationship. If the dreamer sees in a dream a child with a beautiful face This symbolizes the approaching marriage. Seeing a girl in a dream carrying a boy leads to many problems and difficulties, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees a child in a dream with a distorted face, this means failure and multiple losses in his life. Interpretation of seeing a male child in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who has not given birth.

title: Interpretation of seeing a high position in a dream

preview.html: I dreamed that I was in a high place and I was afraid. When you dream that you are in a high place or that you are very high and afraid to fall from it, you get upset and find difficulty in breathing and heartbeat. There is no need to worry when you dream of these high places, fear is a normal reaction for the average person. It can also be a normal response or Fear of climbing high places and heights. It may indicate to a married woman that I wish her well and blessings in her life. If the wife sees herself in high positions and feels fear, this may indicate that her husband is in a prominent and high position and is afraid of failure or removal from his position. Interpretation of a dream about standing in a high place for a woman Married An expression that indicates the love and closeness of a husband and partner to her by providing all comforts, but in an indirect way so as not to be ashamed. This may indicate illness or exposure to adversity and adversity, over a short period. title: Saying there is no god but God in a dream

preview.html: We will learn about the interpretation of the dream of martyrdom and saying the Tashahhud in a dream in detail through our translated website, so follow the lines below with us. Interpretation of seeing saying “There is no god but God” in a single girl’s dream. Saying there is no god but God in a dream is a promising vision. Facilitating matters and improving the situation in the life of a single woman, Something happy may happen to her soon, and God knows best. When an unmarried woman sees “There is no god but God” written in a dream on paper or a wall. This means that success is her ally in life and she can get married soon, God willing. Whoever wrote “There is no god but God” several times Many in her sleep, then he repents of sins and disobedience, hoping for mercy and forgiveness from God Almighty. If he sees in his dream an unmarried woman as if she were dying, and he tried to give her testimony. It is a sign that he is in great trouble, from which he will come out often and beg and ask for forgiveness. See also: Interpretation of a vision The Kaaba in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of following the saying “There is no god but God” in a married woman’s dream. Saying “There is no god but God” in a married woman’s dream. A sign of a radical change for the better in her life, and she may move to a new job or home, and God knows best. Pronounced the Shahada in a dream with difficulty is evidence of... God Almighty will fulfill a wish for the dreamer who has been waiting for it for a long time, and God knows best. Seeing the testimony clearly written in the sky is a sign of the dreamer’s success. Great fame and he will have an important and wonderful position in society. Seeing that there is no god but God written in the sky is evidence of the power of Faith and closeness to God. It nourishes the offspring in the event of delayed childbearing for the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing the saying “There is no god but God” in a dream about a person and its meaning. Imam Ibn Sirin says that saying there is no god but God in a sinner’s dream is repentance, in a sick person’s dream there is healing, and in a afflicted person’s dream is comfort and mercy. From God. And whoever knows the testimony of a dead person in a dream will soon relieve him of his worries and burdens, and God knows best. And whoever is in a state of impurity and sees this dream, let him purify himself. It is best not to stay in the state for a long time, and take a quick bath, and God knows best. To write in a dream: There is no god but God is evidence of entering into profitable contracts and cooperation. Seeing a certificate written in the sky expresses the high status of the dreamer. The name of God in a person’s dream is evidence of success in life, the blessing of life and livelihood. The name of God in the sky is a sign of the fulfillment of desires and the healing of the sick. Read also : Interpretation of seeing the Messenger in a dream without seeing his face, according to Ibn Sirin. Meaning of seeing the saying “There is no god but God” in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Saying that there is no god but God in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the end of troubles and pains and the ease of pregnancy and childbirth, God willing. And whoever sees her husband repeating: The dream: “There is no god but God.” God provides for him, from where he does not expect, and he will not be stingy with money for her and the newborn. To write in a dream, “There is no god but God,” indicates the death of worry and sadness. To relieve anxiety and solve problems and differences between the fortuneteller and her husband. And whoever stumbles in a dream Or she stumbles in martyrdom, her birth may falter and the pain of pregnancy will increase for her, and God knows best. title: The meaning of naked in a dream A dream about a naked woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Meaning: Whoever sees himself naked in front of people, or takes off clothes for a girl, for a girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, and I dreamed that I was naked and naked. Naked: A dream about naked people by Ibn Sirin, if that was while he was working at a job, it means that he was flogged and he got what he wanted. From a dream that he was naked, so he took off his clothes, then he has enemies in the place where he saw him, and he defeated them, and if his organs are not exposed, then he does not control them. Diligence in worship, and if he sees himself distracted in his pursuit of something, he will achieve it according to distraction. As for the naked, if there is no work in it, it is temptation and abandonment of obedience and disgrace. It is said that a man came to Ibn Sirin and said: I saw a man standing in the middle of the mosque, that is, the Basra Mosque, naked with his hand. He hit him with it. A rock tore it apart. . . “Ibn Shirin said to him: This man must be Hassan Al-Basri.” The man said: It is from God. Ibn Sirin said: I know that he is pure of religion. It is the place of the mosque, and his sword with which he strikes his tongue is the one with his words that breaks the stone with the truth of religion. Al-Nabulsi Naked Dreams In a dream, this indicates the person’s inner security or what makes him regret. Whoever appears naked in a meeting will be exposed, and whoever dreams that he is naked does not understand his nakedness or be ashamed. From people, he exaggerates something and gets tired. Whoever dreams that he is naked and is ashamed of people and asks for his jacket, he will lose and become poor. If he sees people looking at his private parts, he will reveal himself. Perhaps a naked divorce or the death of the wife is someone who stripped himself of his clothes and was a deposed ruler, and if he sees a sick person taking off his yellow clothes, this indicates his recovery, as well as his red and black clothes. It is said that shame shows his innocence of the accusation, and if the slave sees that he has been stripped of it, he will be released, and the dead If he sees himself naked and laughing, his joy will appear. And whoever sees that he is naked while he is worried, he will be at ease, and nudity for people of worship increases their religion and goodness. A man’s nakedness means performing Hajj if the dream is a good testimony, and nudity indicates new clothes, so if the sick person is stripped of his clothes and taken from him against his will, he will die. And my nakedness. A woman is separation from her home. Interpretation of a dream about being naked. A dream about being naked indicates insecurity and danger that this person will be exposed to in the coming period. If someone dreams that he is going to work naked, this indicates that you are dissatisfied with your appearance and lack of self-confidence. Being naked is also evidence of Feeling of great responsibility and you will face failure and suffer those consequences. Dreaming naked in a dream. Some may see that nudity in a dream can be a clear sign of weak character, especially in the case of obtaining a new job, entering a new school, or a new emotional relationship, and it can be evidence that The person does not feel safe or psychologically comfortable, but rather feels in danger, and it also indicates that he regrets things or that there are those around him who show indirect hostility to him and show him love.* Also in the event that he is naked in a dream, it could be a sign that he is exposed to personal issues in front of In some cases, people are exposed to seeing him naked in a dream, which causes the person to feel anxious, uncomfortable, and uncomfortable. A person may suffer a loss or get divorced.Dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about entering prison and its consequences

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about entering prison in a dream: In every country on Earth, a place known as a prison has been created where criminals and other people who violate local laws and customs are kept. There are many stories about prisoners and the prison system as a whole. It is also possible for people who suffer from injustice. In their lives to dream of imprisonment in one’s sleep. Also, some commentators believe that seeing prison in a dream is a sign of goodness for the monarch. Interpretation of the dream of entering prison in a dream is one of the visions that many people share by seeing entering prison, as many people believe that he is imprisoned in his dream. This belief is supported by a number of signs and symbols that do not correspond to reality and its interpretation. The dream includes the following:Dreaming about staying in prison indicates that the dreamer will live long and well. Going to prison also represents the dreamer's return from exile. The dreamer's decision to restrict himself there is a message and symbol that he will avoid diseases and epidemics and defend himself against them. When a person comes out of prison He is liberated from introversion, sadness, and loneliness. Whoever dreams of being imprisoned, but the ceiling of the prison is missing, or that a ray of light enters from the prison window, this indicates optimism and hope. It is also one of the praiseworthy visions because it is a salvation from the soul and an alleviation of distress, distress, and anguish. The dreamer’s liberation, happiness, and disappearance. His fears and the solution to his problems is the opening of the prison doors. The transition from a small space to a larger space represents the light that will replace the pain, fatigue and misery that once consumed the dreamer's existence. Breaking out of the prison that the dreamer does not know is a sign of freedom, happiness and comfort that he will soon experience in His life. If he sees himself building a prison, the dreamer will meet a person with knowledge, morals, and religion, who will benefit from him and benefit the nation and the servants. The presence of a sultan or another king imprisoned in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s misfortune and misfortune on his way. And whoever sees an unknown prison, this is a deviation and must A person should avoid desires. Prison in a dream can represent the dreamer’s burial, loneliness, and perhaps a conspiracy. It can also indicate hypocrisy, hypocrisy, and babysitting with rapists. If the dreamer sees the prison doors opening in front of him, this is strong evidence, and how you interpret it is impressive. title: Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream: A child is one of the blessings that God bestows on His servants. He said in his favorite book that money and children are the adornment of the world, so follow us... Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream Interpretation scholars say that seeing a male infant in a dream indicates exposure to many problems and fears. If An unmarried girl saw a male child in her dream, this means that she will go through many problems and accumulations in her life. If the dreamer sees a small child smiling at him in a dream, this symbolizes overcoming difficulties and enjoying multiple successes. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a male child in a dream indicates To misfortunes, family problems and disagreements. If the fortuneteller sees a happy child in a dream, he will give him good news about the positive changes that will happen to him soon and the improvement of his circumstances. If a pregnant woman sees a male child in a dream, this means that she will suffer from many worries and problems in her life. Barren, If she sees a small child in a dream, it promises her that she will give birth to children after a long period of waiting. Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream by Ibn Sirin The great scholar Ibn Sirin says that seeing a male child in a dream means that she will soon give birth to a beautiful child and will be happy with him. In the event that the dreamer sees a tall child Hair in a dream, it symbolizes exposure to marital infidelity, which leads to separation from her. An unmarried girl, if she sees a beautiful child in a dream, indicates a close marriage with a good person and she will be happy with him. The dreamer who sees a child crawling towards her in a dream indicates good Luck and goodness coming to her. If she sees a male child urinating on her in a dream, this means that she will suffer from problems and the accumulation of worries. If the student sees a small child in a dream, smiling at him, it heralds good events and positive changes that will happen to him. If the dreamer sees a male child in a dream This means that he has a friend near him with whom he has enmity and hatred. If the dreamer sees buying a male child in a dream, he will act foolishly in many matters, which will bring him harm. Interpretation of seeing a male child in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees a handsome male child In a dream, it means that good and abundant livelihood will come to her soon. Also, for a dreamer to see a male child in a dream symbolizes a close marriage with a good person soon. And in case the dreamer sees a smiling child in a dream, this means good luck and great happiness that she will be happy with. Seeing Carrying an infant in an unmarried woman’s dreamIf an unmarried girl dreams that an infant is carrying her, this means a close relationship with a suitable person. If the dreamer sees a child in a dream, this means that he will enter into a good love relationship. If the dreamer sees in a dream a child with a beautiful face This symbolizes the approaching marriage. Seeing a girl in a dream carrying a boy leads to many problems and difficulties, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees a child in a dream with a distorted face, this means failure and multiple losses in his life. Interpretation of seeing a male child in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who has not given birth.

Interpretation of seeing saying “There is no god but God” in a single girl’s dream. Saying there is no god but God in a dream is a promising vision. Facilitating matters and improving the situation in the life of a single woman, Something happy may happen to her soon, and God knows best. When an unmarried woman sees “There is no god but God” written in a dream on paper or a wall. This means that success is her ally in life and she can get married soon, God willing. Whoever wrote “There is no god but God” several times Many in her sleep, then he repents of sins and disobedience, hoping for mercy and forgiveness from God Almighty. If he sees in his dream an unmarried woman as if she were dying, and he tried to give her testimony. It is a sign that he is in great trouble, from which he will come out often and beg and ask for forgiveness. See also: Interpretation of a vision The Kaaba in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of following the saying “There is no god but God” in a married woman’s dream. Saying “There is no god but God” in a married woman’s dream. A sign of a radical change for the better in her life, and she may move to a new job or home, and God knows best. Pronounced the Shahada in a dream with difficulty is evidence of... God Almighty will fulfill a wish for the dreamer who has been waiting for it for a long time, and God knows best. Seeing the testimony clearly written in the sky is a sign of the dreamer’s success. Great fame and he will have an important and wonderful position in society. Seeing that there is no god but God written in the sky is evidence of the power of Faith and closeness to God. It nourishes the offspring in the event of delayed childbearing for the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing the saying “There is no god but God” in a dream about a person and its meaning. Imam Ibn Sirin says that saying there is no god but God in a sinner’s dream is repentance, in a sick person’s dream there is healing, and in a afflicted person’s dream is comfort and mercy. From God. And whoever knows the testimony of a dead person in a dream will soon relieve him of his worries and burdens, and God knows best. And whoever is in a state of impurity and sees this dream, let him purify himself. It is best not to stay in the state for a long time, and take a quick bath, and God knows best. To write in a dream: There is no god but God is evidence of entering into profitable contracts and cooperation. Seeing a certificate written in the sky expresses the high status of the dreamer. The name of God in a person’s dream is evidence of success in life, the blessing of life and livelihood. The name of God in the sky is a sign of the fulfillment of desires and the healing of the sick. Read also : Interpretation of seeing the Messenger in a dream without seeing his face, according to Ibn Sirin. Meaning of seeing the saying “There is no god but God” in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Saying that there is no god but God in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the end of troubles and pains and the ease of pregnancy and childbirth, God willing. And whoever sees her husband repeating: The dream: “There is no god but God.” God provides for him, from where he does not expect, and he will not be stingy with money for her and the newborn. To write in a dream, “There is no god but God,” indicates the death of worry and sadness. To relieve anxiety and solve problems and differences between the fortuneteller and her husband. And whoever stumbles in a dream Or she stumbles in martyrdom, her birth may falter and the pain of pregnancy will increase for her, and God knows best. title: The meaning of naked in a dream A dream about a naked woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Meaning: Whoever sees himself naked in front of people, or takes off clothes for a girl, for a girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, and I dreamed that I was naked and naked. Naked A dream about naked people by Ibn Sirin, if that was while he was working at a job, it means that he was flogged and he got what he wanted. From a dream that he was naked, so he took off his clothes, then he has enemies in the place where he saw him, and he defeated them, and if his organs were not exposed, then he does not control them. Diligence in worship, and if he sees himself distracted in his pursuit of something, he will achieve it according to distraction. As for the naked, if there is no work in it, it is temptation and abandonment of obedience and disgrace. It is said that a man came to Ibn Sirin and said: I saw a man standing in the middle of the mosque, that is, the Basra Mosque, naked with his hand. He hit him with it. A rock tore it apart. . . “Ibn Shirin said to him: This man must be Hassan Al-Basri.” The man said: It is from God. Ibn Sirin said: I know that he is pure of religion. It is the place of the mosque, and his sword with which he strikes his tongue is the one with his words that breaks the stone with the truth of religion. Al-Nabulsi Naked Dreams In a dream, this indicates the person’s inner security or what makes him regret. Whoever appears naked in a meeting will be exposed, and whoever dreams that he is naked does not understand his nakedness or be ashamed. From people, he exaggerates something and gets tired. Whoever dreams that he is naked and is ashamed of people and asks for his jacket, he will lose and become poor. If he sees people looking at his private parts, he will reveal himself. Perhaps a naked divorce or the death of the wife is someone who stripped himself of his clothes and was a deposed ruler, and if he sees a sick person taking off his yellow clothes, this indicates his recovery, as well as his red and black clothes. It is said that shame shows his innocence of the accusation, and if the slave sees that he has been stripped of it, he will be released, and the dead If he sees himself naked and laughing, his joy will appear. And whoever sees that he is naked while he is worried, he will be at ease, and nudity for people of worship increases their religion and goodness. A man’s nakedness means performing Hajj if the dream is a good testimony, and nudity indicates new clothes, so if the sick person is stripped of his clothes and taken from him against his will, he will die. And my nakedness. A woman is separation from her home. Interpretation of a dream about being naked. A dream about being naked indicates insecurity and danger that this person will be exposed to in the coming period. If someone dreams that he is going to work naked, this indicates that you are dissatisfied with your appearance and lack of self-confidence. Being naked is also evidence of Feeling of great responsibility and you will face failure and suffer those consequences. Dreaming naked in a dream.
